org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades

Interface Blade

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockingBlade, CommonReactor, ISMTransaction<VALUE>, IsolationBlade, NonBlockingBlade, PoolThreadReactorImpl, Reactor, ReactorImpl, SwingBoundBlade, ThreadBoundBlade, Transaction<IMMUTABLE>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsyncTransaction, BladeBase, BlockingBladeBase, BlockingReactor, Facility, ImmutableReference, ISMReference, ISMRemoveTransaction, ISMSyncTransaction, ISMUpdateTransaction, IsolationBladeBase, IsolationReactor, NonBlockingBladeBase, NonBlockingReactor, ReactorBase, RequestBus, Subscription, SwingBoundBladeBase, SwingBoundReactor, SyncTransaction, ThreadBoundBladeBase, ThreadBoundReactor, TransactionBase

    public interface Blade

    A blade is an object with state operated on by requests within the thread context of a single reactor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Reactor getReactor()
      Returns the reactor used by the requests of this blade.

    • Method Detail

      • getReactor

        Reactor getReactor()
        Returns the reactor used by the requests of this blade.
        Returns:
        The Reactor.
